original_title: 新人NO.1STYLE 東雲美玲 AV出道
overview: I found a Cinderella girl. 'Shinonome Mirei', 20 years old, who loves female idols and longs for a glittering front stage, but gave up due to the corona disaster. She has an innocent and shy personality, but she is not good at standing in front of the public and is a shy person... A star candidate who is attractive and wants to support her 'real face' that exposes her unadorned self. Of course she likes sex, so she chose the path of an AV actress. I'm a skinny type and when I take it off, I'm surprised at my white skin Gcup! You are a Cinderella girl!
title: Fresh Face NO.1 STYLE – Mirei Shinonome AV Debut
